required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Letrozole Combined With Anlotinib Hydrochloride in the Treatment of Platinum-resistant Recurrent Ovarian Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: Letrozole Combined With Anlotinib Hydrochloride in the Treatment of Platinum-resistant Recurrent Ovarian Cancer: a Prospective, Single-arm, Open Label, Exploratory Phase 2 Clinical Trial.

lead_sponsor.agency: Xinhua Hospital, Shanghai Jiao Tong University School of Medicine

clinical_study.source: Xinhua Hospital, Shanghai Jiao Tong University School of Medicine

brief_summary.textblock: The study is a prospective, single-arm, open label, exploratory phase 2 clinical trial, which aims to study the therapeutic effect of letrozole combined with anlotinib hydrochloride in platinum-resistant recurrent ovarian cancer.

detailed_description.textblock: The study is a prospective, single-arm, open label, exploratory phase 2 clinical trial, which aims to study the therapeutic effect of letrozole combined with anlotinib hydrochloride in platinum-resistant recurrent ovarian cancer.The patient has undergone surgery and received ≥2 lines of platinum-containing chemotherapy.

arm_group.description: Letrozole combined with anlotinib hydrochloride in the treatment of platinum-resistant recurrent ovarian cancer.

intervention.description: Letrozole combined with anlotinib hydrochloride in the treatment of platinum-resistant recurrent ovarian cancer.

facility.name: Xinhua Hospital Affiliated to Shanghai Jiaotong University School of Medicine
